ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not sure about Berserkers, but Verses definitely overwrites Provocation.  So if the main tank is in your party and you re singing Verses, Provocation will
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 12 Apr 2000, Katy Westerman wrote:
>
> I saw a suggestion somewhere, for the new song. Maybe it was here...anyway,
> the suggestion was that a bard who's only using instruments and damage songs
> probably doesn't really need to keep the mob targetted, and can therefore
> keep the main tank targetted (assuming he's the only tank in the group) and
> add this song in during the twist. Shrug, just something different than
> powerlevelling twinks.

Not sure about Berserkers, but Verses definitely overwrites
Provocation. So if the main tank is in your party and you're
singing Verses, Provocation will not stick.

Oh, another problem with the song is that it doesn't give you
a message when it sticks. The target does get a message
though.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
